name: reximddv
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w2, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w2, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)), w1)

comment: Deduction from Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Dec-2016.)
